entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 4 except 7 inland.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this morning. Rain beginning this morning. Fog patches developing this morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. High plus 4 except 7 inland. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with periods of snow after midnight. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or snow. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
